desmoj.core.simulator

Class Condition<E extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.simulator.NamedObject
      • desmoj.core.simulator.ModelComponent
        • desmoj.core.simulator.Condition<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IsJobForTransporter, MyTruck

    public abstract class Condition<E extends Entity>
extends ModelComponent
    Derive from this class to create a conditional which an entity (including processes as special entities) may fulfill or not, e.g. for the purpose of queue filtering. Override method check(E e) such that it returns true whenever an entity complies to the condition. For conditions that do not apply to a specific Entity, but to the model as whole (e.g. when to stop an experiment), use ModelCondition.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Condition

        public Condition(Model owner,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 boolean showInTrace,
                 java.lang.Object... args)
        Constructs a condition with the given name and parameters for trace files.
        Parameters:
        owner - Model : The main model this condition is associated to
        name - java.lang.String : The name of this condition
        showInTrace - boolean : Flag for showing this condition in trace-files. Set it to true if model should show up in trace, false if model should not be shown in trace.
        args - Object... : Arguments to pass to the condition (can be omitted)

    • Method Detail

      • hasPrimitiveArguments

        public boolean hasPrimitiveArguments()

      • getConstructArguments

        public java.lang.Object[] getConstructArguments()

      • check

        public abstract boolean check(E e)
        Returns a boolean showing whether the given Entity complies to the condition tested by this method or not. Inherit from this class and implement this abstract method to return true if the passed Entity conforms to your special condition.
        Parameters:
        e - E : The Entity to test the condition on
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true, if the entity given conforms to the condition, false otherwise.

      • check

        @Deprecated
public boolean check()
        Deprecated. Replaced by ModelCondition.check() Returns a boolean showing whether the model complies to the condition tested by this method or not. Inherit from this class and override this method to return true if the model conforms to your special condition; the entity type this condition was parameterised with is ignored.
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true, if the model conforms to the condition, false otherwise.
